extendedInfo.description: Tab is the simple way to split a bill among friends. Snap a pic of the receipt and tap your items to claim them. Tax and tip are calculated for you. No more back-of-the-napkin algebra or typing in prices by hand! Here's how it works:â¢ Take a picture of your receipt to read in all the items and pricesâ¢ Go around the table selecting which items each person ordered; multiple people can select the same item if they shared itâ¢ Tax and tip are automatically divided proportionallyâ¢ If it's someone's birthday, you can split their total evenly among everyone elseâ¢ You can also add the last four digits of each person's credit card number to show your server what amount to put on each card

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Love the camera feature to automatically input the info. Really easy to use and takes out the guesswork of splitting the bill with a big group.
reviews.author: Eric Gotthelf

reviews.title: Definitely Useful
reviews.comment: It\'s definitely useful, sleek design that serves its purpose at the table.
reviews.author: Jonathan Ford

reviews.title: Bravo!
reviews.comment: I cannot believe it has taken so long for a well designed app to come along to solve this problem. Fast, beautiful and incredibly useful. I love it.
reviews.author: Francois Baldassari
